goals__remit: To provide specialist environmental advice to governments, agencies and industry, focussing on marine biodiversity conservation and assessment of impacts of human activities on marine habitats and species.    Aims are to support sustainable exploitation of the marine environment in tandem with effective biodiversity conservation, improving the availability of data and its appropriate use.
